title: Workshop on Improving Teaching Methods Based on School Change Models and Professional Learning Communities for Vocational Training Institutions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and possession of fundamental vocational training knowledge
context.additional_context: Language curriculum improvement program for secondary learners in vocational training institutions, requiring career-linked education for medical/legal/technical professions

learning_goals: Through participation in a professional learning community, learners can apply three or more collaborative problem-solving strategies with fellow teachers.
Learners can apply the three stages (diagnosis-design-implementation) of the school change model to language curriculum improvement.
Learners can develop two or more customized language education materials reflecting local community contexts (e.g., medical, legal, or technological fields).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
